title: The History of the Internet
description: This episode explores the history of the Internet, from its origins as a military research project to its current status as a global communications network.

segments.content: In this segment, we'll discuss the early history of the Internet, from its origins as a military research project to its development as a global communications network.

In this segment, we'll hear from John Smith, a computer scientist who was involved in the early development of the Internet. He'll share his insights on the challenges and triumphs of building the Internet.
In this segment, we'll discuss the impact of the Internet on society. We'll explore how the Internet has changed the way we communicate, learn, and do business.
